lines.text: ...Well, that bottle of blood- that isn't cheap.
Yeah, you said as much. You think that's relevant?
Or are you tryin' to make me let you swipe evidence from the crime scene again?
No, no- it's just, this level-up ritual... it doesn't require any virgin's blood.
Excellent question. And- and, meaningless question.
What I'm getting at is, what if they were planning some other ritual?
There's plenty of other stuff in this book- maybe something that uses the blood!
That- they could've had that for- for something they were planning later!
You can't- you can't show that they didn't do the level-up ritual with that.
